title: How to Customize Your Character on Roblox

steps.headline: Log into your Roblox account.
steps.description: Navigate to Roblox.com and log in with your email and password.

steps.headline: Select "Character" from the menu in the upper right corner.
steps.description: The menu button appears as three horizontal bars. This brings up the character customization menu, where you can adjust your looks and add all the cool new swag you bought at the stores.

steps.headline: Choose a new t-shirt.
steps.description: Shirts are the most visible change you can make, and they will all appear in boxes to the right of your character. Select one to equip it.

steps.headline: Customize the rest of your body.
steps.description: You can click on each body part to choose accessories, items, and customization. You can only wear a maximum of 3 hats, 1 shirt, 1 pants, 1 face, 2 Arms, 2 Legs, 1 package, and 1 gear at once.

steps.headline: Click the gear when you finish customizing.
steps.description: There will be a little gear icon above your character. Select it and choose "Wear" to start rocking your new outfit.

steps.headline: Earn some Robux.
steps.description: If you're a member of the Builder's Club, you earn a certain amount of robux a day. You also earn them in game, and can buy them in bundles from Roblox. This is your currency in the Catalog. Builder's club members can sell old shirts, hats, etc. and keep 70% of the profits. If you develop games on Roblox, you can use ads to make some in-game cash.

steps.headline: Log into Roblox.com and click on the "Catalog."
steps.description: There is a button on the top, blue rail that brings you to the catalog. You'll be able to browse by type of customization.

steps.headline: Buy your gear and equip it in the "Character Customization" menu.
steps.description: Once you've purchased something, find and equip it by going to the menu (3-green lines), then "Character." From here you can equip your new stuff.

text: Changing Character Appearance Log into your Roblox account. Navigate to Roblox.com and log in with your email and password. Select "Character" from the menu in the upper right corner. The menu button appears as three horizontal bars. This brings up the character customization menu, where you can adjust your looks and add all the cool new swag you bought at the stores. Choose a new t-shirt. Shirts are the most visible change you can make, and they will all appear in boxes to the right of your character. Select one to equip it. Customize the rest of your body. You can click on each body part to choose accessories, items, and customization. You can only wear a maximum of 3 hats, 1 shirt, 1 pants, 1 face, 2 Arms, 2 Legs, 1 package, and 1 gear at once. Click the gear when you finish customizing. There will be a little gear icon above your character. Select it and choose "Wear" to start rocking your new outfit. Getting New Clothing Earn some Robux. If you're a member of the Builder's Club, you earn a certain amount of robux a day. You also earn them in game, and can buy them in bundles from Roblox. This is your currency in the Catalog. Builder's club members can sell old shirts, hats, etc. and keep 70% of the profits. If you develop games on Roblox, you can use ads to make some in-game cash. Log into Roblox.com and click on the "Catalog." There is a button on the top, blue rail that brings you to the catalog. You'll be able to browse by type of customization. Buy your gear and equip it in the "Character Customization" menu. Once you've purchased something, find and equip it by going to the menu (3-green lines), then "Character." From here you can equip your new stuff.
